name: Rallycrash
body:
RallyCrash README
==========
This is a small rally racing game.

It is developed by PixelPlayer2000 and Gobledegook.

How to play:
	Download the zip from <https://github.com/PixelPlayer2000/RallyCrash/archive/master.zip>,
	unzip it and open "RallyCrash.exe".

	Key bindings:
		accelerate - up key
		decelerate - down key
		hand brake - space bar
		shift up - 'W' key
		shift down - 'S' key
		shift into park - 'P' key
		steer right - right key
		steer left - left key
		quit to menu - 'esc' key
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
